english.segment1: Is anyone thirsty, anyone?. Is anyone thirsty?. Is anyone thirsty, anyone?. Is anyone thirsty?. Jesus said: 'Let them come to me and drink. Let them come to me'
english.segment2: O, let the living waters flow. O, let the living waters flow. Let the river of your Spirit. Flow through me (Repeat all). Flow through me
english.segment3: Let the living waters flow. Let the living waters flow. Let the living waters flow. Let the living waters flow
